title: Pop culture in the Arab world
description: Shereen El Feki shows how some Arab cultures are borrowing trademarks of Western pop culture -- music videos, comics, even Barbie -- and adding a culturally appropriate twist. The hybridized media shows how two civilizations, rather than dividing, can dovetail.
author: Shereen El Feki
keywords: TED, talks, Egypt, culture, entertainment, global issues, media, music
